entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Welcome to my blog! I am Bittor Ala침a, a year-old
entry.content:
Welcome to my blog! I am Bittor Ala침a, a 27 year-old Software Architect from Bilbao, Basque Country. I work for Kurago Software, a member of Bystronic Group. We are specialists in the sheet metal industry, and are striving to develop a smart factory that will fulfill the vision of Industry 4.0.

This web is simply a little portfolio I have made myself, to showcase who I am and what my interests are. I hope I can make some contributions from time to this blog from time to time 游땕.

My passions include (but are not limited to):

  • Hiking in the mountain.
  • Kickboxing and basketball.
  • Reading.
  • Cooking.
  • Coding and problem solving.
  • Sipping a coffee or glass of wine with friends and family.

Computer Science-wise, I am very keen on Data Science, Data Analytics, Cryptography, Machine Learning, and backend development.
